snippet: Lawmakers summoned President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad to answer questions about “irregularities” related to his handling of the country’s struggling economy, the semiofficial Mehr news agency reported.
abstract: Iranian lawmakers muster enough votes to compel Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad to testify before them about what they refer to as 'irregularities' related to his handling of the country's struggling economy; summons reflects an unusual display of a domestic power struggle that has been simmering within Iran’s conservative hierarchy.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers summoned President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad to answer questions about “irregularities” related to his handling of the country’s struggling economy, the semiofficial Mehr news agency reported.

headline.seo: Iran Parliament Summons Ahmadinejad to Testify
headline.main: Ahmadinejad Must Testify in Iran’s Parliament
headline.print_headline: Iran Leader Must Testify In Parliament
